duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead end to end initiatives in the Finance area ensuring robust, scalable design and quality deliverables.
Drive requirements definition, prioritization, and solution design in alignment with business value expectations and objectives.
Adequately communicate design decisions, their impact, and trade-offs to business stakeholders.
Ensure the technical solution adequately addresses the business requirements.
Work with Project Manager to ensure adequate project planning and status reporting.
Support business stakeholders with initial assessment / evaluation of solution alternatives.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, Finance, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
